
[**Serra do Mar State Park - Santa Virgínia/Itamambuca base**](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Parque+Estadual+da+Serra+do+Mar+-+N%C3%BAcleo+Santa+Virg%C3%ADnia/@-23.3349191,-45.1488121,1026m/data=!3m1!1e3!4m8!1m2!2m1!1sgoogle+maps!3m4!1s0x94cd489c5fc6d0b7:0x8a16530af57f0828!8m2!3d-23.3357881!4d-45.1460047)

Santa Virgínia is the most faunated area of our experiment, and we can find there the LHMs Lowland tapir (*Tapirus terrestris*) and White‐lipped peccary (*Tayassu pecari*).
